# init(orientedBounds:transform:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance from an oriented bounding box and transform.

## Declaration

```swift
init(orientedBounds: OrientedBoundingBox, transform: Transform = Transform.identity)
```
title: init(orientedBounds:transform:)
